title: Getting Newer Tractors Out Into the Fields: Kennedy Implement 2012 Dealership of the Year 1

tasks.task: Understand the company's market and success.
subtasks: Identify the company's customer base (agricultural equipment dealers).
Recognize the company's sales focus (100-150 horsepower tractors).
Note strategies for customer engagement (demonstrations, rentals, sales tactics).

tasks.task: Evaluate market trends and customer needs.
subtasks: Observe changes in machinery usage over time.
Consider the longevity of high-horsepower machines.
Assess the impact of technology on machines and customer turnover.
Note differences in machine lifespan in the Pacific Northwest.
Explore strategies for encouraging technology adoption and trade-ins.
